effect_entries.effect:
Held: Increases the power of the holder's Steel moves by 20%.
Held by Onix or Scyther: Evolves the holder into Steelix or Scizor when traded, respectively.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Steel-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A hold item that
raises the power of
STEEL-type moves.

A hold item that
raises the power of
STEEL-type moves.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A special metallic film that boosts
the power of STEEL-type moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a special metallic film that ups
the power of Steel-type moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a special metallic film that ups
the power of Steel-type moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a special metallic film that ups
the power of Steel-type moves.

Objet à tenir. Pellicule métallique
spéciale qui monte la puissance des
capacités de type Acier.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a special metallic film that ups
the power of Steel-type moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a special metallic film that ups
the power of Steel-type moves.

とくしゅな　きんぞくの　まく。
もたせると　はがねタイプの
わざの　いりょくが　あがる。

특수한 금속 장막.
지니게 하면 강철타입
기술의 위력이 올라간다.

Objet à tenir. Une pellicule métallique spéciale
qui augmente la puissance des capacités de type
Acier.

Ein Item, das einem Pokémon zum Tragen
gegeben werden kann. Es verstärkt Attacken
vom Typ Stahl.

Colmillo de gran dureza que refuerza los
movimientos de tipo Dragón. Debe llevarlo
un Pokémon.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Speciale pellicola metallica che potenzia le mosse
di tipo Acciaio.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a special metallic film that can
boost the power of Steel-type moves.

特殊な　金属の　膜。
持たせると　はがねタイプの
技の　威力が　あがる。

攜帶後，鋼屬性的
